idea-plugin.name: LogSensei
idea-plugin.description:
LogSensei helps Java developers write better logging code by detecting missing logs and suggesting appropriate log levels.

Features:
  • Catch blocks — detects empty catch blocks, suggests ERROR/SEVERE level logging
  • Loops — warns about INFO logs in loops, suggests changing to DEBUG/FINE
  • Early returns — detects guard clauses without logging, suggests DEBUG/FINE level
  • Spring components — ensures @Service/@Controller/@RestController methods have entry/exit INFO logs

Smart automation:
  • Automatically adds Lombok annotations (@Slf4j, @Log4j2)
  • Adds missing dependencies to Maven/Gradle
  • Educational tooltips explaining log levels

Supported logging frameworks: SLF4J + Logback, Log4j2, java.util.logging

Usage: Press Alt+Enter on highlighted code and select the suggested fix.

Requirements: IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3+, Java 17+, Lombok plugin (recommended)
